channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- httpd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- httpd

item.title: CVE-2017-12171|2024-08-05T18:28:16.561Z -- red%20hat -- httpd
item.description: A regression was found in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.9 version of httpd 2.2.15-60, causing comments in the "Allow" and "Deny" configuration lines to be parsed incorrectly. A web administrator could unintentionally allow any client to access a restricted HTTP resource.
